ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Stacking?
ygData.msgSnippet: what it comes down to is: lute of howler doesnt stack with other illusions anymore-- motion sickness & annoying growl ss bracer-- pretty near useless effect
ygData.messageBody:
what it comes down to is:
lute of howler doesnt stack with other illusions anymore--> motion sickness
& annoying growl
ss bracer--> pretty near useless effect now
lute also doesnt stack with focus and I think with epic as well or something
like that

Minkin
RIP
A Ro.

-----Original Message-----
From: Donny Dane [mailto:ddane01@...]
Sent: September 25, 2001 8:47 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Stacking?


Check out the numerous threads on the message boards at:
www.attcanada.net/~reaper

they basically fubar'd bards in the high end game, causing epic and lute
of the howler and other effects to not stack, while not addressing the
problem they stated, which was double stacking buffs and/or damage
shields on bards.

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
Solusek Ro Obsidian Fear
